sentences.en: Anyone returning the necklace will be handsomely rewarded for doing so.
sentences.cn: 任何人只要送还那条项链就可得到一笔可观的奖赏.

sentences.en: Anyone returning the necklace will be handsomely rewarded.
sentences.cn: 送还项链者将得到丰厚的酬金.

sentences.en: Doing so will pay off handsomely in the end.
sentences.cn: 这样做最终将让您漂亮地搞定一切。

sentences.en: He was rewarded handsomely for his efforts.
sentences.cn: 他的付出获得了丰厚的回报。

sentences.en: His old aunt came down handsomely ; she sent him a cheque for & 100.
sentences.cn: 他的老姑妈慷慨解囊, 寄给他一张一百 英镑 的支票.

sentences.en: It was near Grand Street, and turned out to be very handsomely fitted up.
sentences.cn: 这家酒店靠近格蓝德街, 果然装修得非常漂亮.

sentences.en: It was very handsomely built of red brick with a lead roof.
sentences.cn: 它是用红砖建成的,非常漂亮,屋顶铺着铅板.

sentences.en: Nesta took a bold step and it paid off handsomely for him!
sentences.cn: 而内斯塔迈出了勇敢的一步,他得到了丰厚的报酬!

sentences.en: The car ran perfectly to the finish, and we won handsomely.
sentences.cn: 车圆满地跑到终点，我们遥遥领先，赢得了比赛。
客厅的比例合理，尽显大气。

sentences.en: The Guillotine goes handsomely. I love it.
sentences.cn: 断头台干得真漂亮, 我真喜欢它.

sentences.en: The handsomely furnished residence is full of fine decorations.
sentences.cn: 布置得漂漂亮亮的公馆里满是精致的摆设.

sentences.en: The house was handsome and handsomely fitted up.
sentences.cn: 房子很漂亮,布置得很讲究.

sentences.en: The investor believes that his investment will pay off handsomely soon.
sentences.cn: 这个投资者相信他的投资不久会有相当大的收益.

sentences.en: The printed libretto was handsomely got up.
sentences.cn: 这本印刷的歌剧剧本装帧得很美观.

words.tran_cn: （男子）英俊的；可观的；大方的，慷慨的；健美而端庄的
漂亮地；慷慨地；相当大地

trans.tran_cn: 大方地，慷慨地，精致地，<海>缓慢小心地
